properties.areaDesc: Interior Hancock; Central Washington; Southern Penobscot
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 11:50AM EST until February 8 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow...sleet and freezing rain. Additional ice
accumuluation of a quarter inch for a total of up to a half
inch. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm
total of 3 to 5 inches and additional sleet accumulations of
around one third of an inch.

* WHERE...Southern Penobscot, Interior Hancock and Central
Washington Counties.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Power outages and tree damage are possible
due to the ice and wind. Travel could be very difficult. The
hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet
and ice will make travel extremely dangerous.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY
